capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: The role requires clear communication to develop and implement communication and engagement strategies.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with various teams within the department is essential for a coordinated approach to communications and engagement.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Planning and prioritizing are crucial for managing multiple projects and engagement activities.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Identifying emerging stakeholder issues and synthesizing information requires problem-solving skills.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: The role involves influencing stakeholders and negotiating to achieve positive engagement outcomes.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for the development and delivery of communication materials and updating stakeholder information.

capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Providing customer-centric services aligns with the role's focus on stakeholder and community engagement.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Supporting the delivery of communications for various programs requires adaptability to change.

skills.name: Stakeholder Management
skills.description: Identifying, mapping, and engaging with stakeholders to support sensitive and complex programs.

skills.name: Event Coordination
skills.description: Coordinating town hall meetings, consultation forums, and online engagements.

skills.name: Data Management
skills.description: Updating and managing stakeholder information in a Customer Relationship Management system.

skills.name: Strategic Communication
skills.description: Developing and executing communication strategies across various channels.

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.description: Quickly adapting to emerging stakeholder matters and changing project priorities.

generalRole.title: Communications and Engagement Advisor
generalRole.description: This role involves developing and implementing communication and engagement strategies for government programs, requiring skills in stakeholder management, strategic communication, and adaptability to change.
